memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int reason, const z_arch_esf_t *esf, struct k_thread *thread)
memberdef.name: coredump

detaileddescription.para: Normally, this is called inside z_fatal_error() to generate coredump when a fatal error is encountered. This can also be called on demand whenever a coredump is desired.

parameterdescription.para: Start address of memory region to be dumped
End address of memory region to be dumped

detaileddescription.para: This outputs the buffer of byte array to the coredump backend. For example, this can be called to output the coredump section containing registers, or a section for memory dump.

parameterdescription.para: Buffer to be send to coredump output

detaileddescription.para: Query the coredump subsystem for information, for example, if there is an error.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to argument for exchanging information

detaileddescription.para: Perform certain on coredump subsystem, for example, output the stored coredump via logging.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to argument for exchanging information
